patthana19.14:1.1_0: Naatīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.14:1.1_1: Naanāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.14:1.1_2: Naatīto ca naanāgato ca dhammā paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.14:3.1_0: Naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.14:3.1_1: Naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.14:3.1_2: Naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.14:4.1_0: Naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.14:4.1_1: Naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.14:5.1_0: Napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.14:5.1_1: Napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.14:5.1_2: Napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
